Heads.Name: 047AN02
Heads.Notes: A Head with high stability and the best camera in the game. It can extend lock range by up to 25%. Otherwise, it's defenses and speed are average, and has an above average drain

Core.Name: 03-AALIYAH/C
Core.Notes: Lightweight part for PA use designed for speedy combat.

Arms.Name: A01-TELLUS
Arms.Notes: A part focused on EN supply, designed for certain weapons.

Legs.Name: LG-JUDITH
Legs.Notes: The second slowest lightweight leg, it makes up for its low speed with higher than average defenses for its class.
